title: Stop And Eat
details: My first experience in front-end development, a project for educational purposes for the final stage of grade 11. This project was a mini static website to meet the required goals

title: Mision TIC
details: Educational program carried out by the government, my first time really collaborating with people with objectives such as building web applications

title: Memorable Website
details: Memorable web store is a personalized wine company for sale to the public, people can fill out forms by completing the information required to make their purchase order, it was a dinamic website that I worked as a front-end developer
